description=M5Stack-FIRE
upload.tool=esptool
upload.maximum_size=1310720
upload.maximum_data_size=327680
upload.wait_for_upload_port=true
serial.disableDTR=true
serial.disableRTS=true
build.mcu=esp32
build.core=esp32
build.variant=m5stack_fire
build.board=M5STACK_FIRE
build.f_cpu=240000000L
build.flash_size=16MB
build.flash_freq=80m
build.flash_mode=dio
build.boot=dio
build.defines=

options.PSRAM.name=PSRAM
options.PSRAM.default=disabled
options.PSRAM.disabled.name=Disabled
options.PSRAM.disabled.build.defines=
options.PSRAM.enabled.name=Enabled
options.PSRAM.enabled.build.defines=-DBOARD_HAS_PSRAM -mfix-esp32-psram-cache-issue
build.defines=${option:PSRAM.build.defines}

name=m5stack-fire
family=esp32
group=ESP32
core=esp32
